output_list.reason: The mintToken function does not have a check on the mintedAmount, allowing an overflow of the balanceOf the target address.
The transfer function does not have a check on the _value, allowing an overflow of the balanceOf the target address.
The transferFrom function does not have a check on the _value, allowing an overflow of the balanceOf the target address.
The mintToken function allows the owner to mint tokens to any address without any restrictions, potentially devaluing the token.
The mintToken function is restricted to only the owner, but there is no check to ensure that the target address is a user and not a contract that can execute arbitrary code.
